text: Somebody Waiting is a 1971 American short documentary film produced by Woody Omens. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1971 films Category:1971 short films Category:1970s short documentary films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American short documentary films Category:American independent films Category:Documentary films about children Category:Documentary films about health care
title: Somebody Waiting
